skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: As a front-end developer, I craft seamless and visually appealing user experiences on the web. My expertise lies in translating design concepts into interactive and responsive websites that captivate users.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: As a backend developer, I build the robust and invisible foundation that powers your web applications. Behind the scenes, I work with databases, server logic, and APIs to ensure seamless functionality and data management.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: On the UI side, I bring designs to life with a keen eye for aesthetics and a deep understanding of visual hierarchy. From color palettes to typography, I meticulously craft interfaces that not only look good but also enhances usability
